column2: altersgruppen_table <- table(factor(dat$Altersgruppen, levels = c("0-19", "20-39", "40-59", "60-79", "80-99","100 u. älter"),labels = c("0-19", "20-39", "40-59", "60-79", "80-99","100+"), ordered = T), factor(dat$KreisLang, levels = kreise, ordered = T))
barplot(altersgruppen_table, las = 1, ylim = c(0,11000), col = c("turquoise", "yellow", "green", "red", "orange", "blue"), beside = T, las = 2)
